content: times 40sts round 4 k round 5 k3 k2tog repeat eight times 32 sts round 6 k round 7 k2 k2tog repeat eight times 24 sts round 8 k round 9 k k2tog repeat eight times 16 sts round 10 k round 11 k2tog repeat eight times 8 sts pull yarn through all stitches and pull tightly to close the gap weave in ends soak the bowl and let dry upside down on a glass or bowl of about the same diameter copyright @2017 ariane gallizzi stitch npaste@gmail com page 2
